Content:
when trying to setup a solo mining pool i keep running into this error  when trying to run nvm install 8 from  @webworker01  readme https://github.com/webworker01/Knomp-solo    ,    Command 'nvm' not found, did you mean:

  command 'nvi' from deb nvi
  command 'nvme' from deb nvme-cli
  command 'nam' from deb nam
  command 'nvim' from deb neovim
  command 'nm' from deb binutils
  command 'num' from deb quickcal
  command 'lvm' from deb lvm2
  command 'npm' from deb npm
  command 'kvm' from deb qemu-kvm
  command 'pvm' from deb pvm
  command 'nim' from deb nim
  command 'vm' from deb mgetty-voice

Try: apt install <deb name>

Author: ComputerGenie 汨ｴ沛ｼ沒｢#7004
Content: What I think is that the only reason the lemming coins are "safe" from ASICs is that BM makes all of their products to serve both comercial and hobby markets at the same time and others have followed their lead. All it will take is 1 $12k unit that uses variables and the fallacy that the "anti-ASIC" movement was founded on will crumble. The only "resistance" in equihash is the concept that RAM is expensive.
